entry.title: Proposal to replace BIP0039
entry.summary: The linked Wikipedia page offers a straightforward implementation method for BIP 0039, which includes formatting metadata. The page provides several ideas on how to format the metadata and ensure it is easily readable and understandable for users. The goal of this implementation is to enhance user experience and simplify the use of BIP 0039. It is important to ensure that the metadata is well-formatted so that users can easily understand it and use it effectively. By following the guidelines provided on the linked page, developers can create an efficient and user-friendly implementation of BIP 0039.
